SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
DECLARE @Periodo Int SET @Periodo = (SELECT distinct id_periodo from AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA)
/* Borra tabla H_DEBITOS_ORIGEN (Utilizada para el Tablero de Internación) */ DELETE FROM H_DEBITOS_ORIGEN WHERE id_periodo = @Periodo
/* Actualiza tabla H_DEBITOS_ORIGEN (Utilizada para el Tablero de Internación) */ INSERT INTO H_DEBITOS_ORIGEN SELECT id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, MAX('')as de_orden_int, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador, MAX(id_usuario_auditor) as id_usuario_auditor, id_prestacion, sum(importe_debito*signo_debito_credito) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Cliente , MAX(0) as importe_debito_Medico_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Medico_Cliente, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Cliente FROM H_DEBITOS WHERE id_origen_debito = 'A' and id_destinatario_debito = 'A' and id_periodo = @Periodo GROUP BY id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador , id_prestacion
INSERT INTO H_DEBITOS_ORIGEN SELECT id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, MAX('')as de_orden_int, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador, MAX(id_usuario_auditor) as id_usuario_auditor, id_prestacion, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Acreedor, sum(importe_debito*signo_debito_credito) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Cliente , MAX(0) as importe_debito_Medico_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Medico_Cliente, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Cliente FROM H_DEBITOS WHERE id_origen_debito = 'A' and id_destinatario_debito = 'C' and id_periodo = @Periodo GROUP BY id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador, id_prestacion
INSERT INTO H_DEBITOS_ORIGEN SELECT id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, MAX('')as de_orden_int, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador, MAX(id_usuario_auditor) as id_usuario_auditor, id_prestacion, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Cliente , sum(importe_debito*signo_debito_credito) as importe_debito_Medico_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Medico_Cliente, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Cliente FROM H_DEBITOS WHERE id_origen_debito = 'M' and id_destinatario_debito = 'A' and id_periodo = @Periodo GROUP BY id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador, id_prestacion
INSERT INTO H_DEBITOS_ORIGEN SELECT id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, MAX('')as de_orden_int, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador, MAX(id_usuario_auditor) as id_usuario_auditor, id_prestacion, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Cliente , MAX(0) as importe_debito_Medico_Acreedor, sum(importe_debito*signo_debito_credito) as importe_debito_Medico_Cliente, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Cliente FROM H_DEBITOS WHERE id_origen_debito = 'M' and id_destinatario_debito = 'C' and id_periodo = @Periodo GROUP BY id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador , id_prestacion
INSERT INTO H_DEBITOS_ORIGEN SELECT id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, MAX('')as de_orden_int, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador, MAX(id_usuario_auditor) as id_usuario_auditor, id_prestacion, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Cliente , MAX(0) as importe_debito_Medico_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Medico_Cliente, sum(importe_debito*signo_debito_credito) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Cliente FROM H_DEBITOS WHERE id_origen_debito = 'T' and id_destinatario_debito = 'A' and id_periodo = @Periodo GROUP BY id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador , id_prestacion
INSERT INTO H_DEBITOS_ORIGEN SELECT id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, MAX('')as de_orden_int, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador, MAX(id_usuario_auditor) as id_usuario_auditor, id_prestacion, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Administrativo_Cliente , MAX(0) as importe_debito_Medico_Acreedor, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Medico_Cliente, MAX(0) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Acreedor, sum(importe_debito*signo_debito_credito) as importe_debito_Tecnico_Cliente FROM H_DEBITOS WHERE id_origen_debito = 'T' and id_destinatario_debito = 'C' and id_periodo = @Periodo GROUP BY id_periodo, nro_cursograma, id_tipo_orden, nro_orden, id_producto, id_plan_producto, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador, id_prestacion

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destinaton. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

component.refId: Package\Puente de Datos Directo\OLE DB Destination
component.contactInfo: OLE DB Destination;Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SqlServer v10; (C) Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;4
component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
declare @Periodo_H_Debitos int
declare @Periodo_Proceso_Correcto char(2)
Select @Periodo_H_Debitos = max(id_periodo) from Aux_H_Debitos
If @Periodo_H_Debitos <> (Select max(id_periodo) from Aux_Periodo_Mes_Borra) RAISERROR ('Periodo Proceso Actualización H_DEBITO Incorrecto.', 16, 1)
----- Elimina el periodo en la H_DEBITOS DELETE h_debitos FROM AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA A INNER JOIN h_debitos H ON A.ID_PERIODO = H.ID_PERIODO
